scene.tuio
Interface SceneTuioListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Scene
public interface SceneTuioListener

The SceneTuioListener interface extends the TuioListener inteface, and provides a simple callback infrastructure which is used by the SceneTuioClient class to dispatch TUIO and Scene events to all registered instances of classes that implement the interface.

Any class that implements the SceneTuioListener interface is required to implement all of the callback methods defined here. The SceneTuioClient makes use of these interface methods in order to dispatch TUIO and Scene events to all registered SceneTuioListener implementations.

public class MySceneTuioListener implements SceneTuioListener
...

MySceneTuioListener listener = new MySceneTuioListener();
SceneTuioClient client = new SceneTuioClient();
client.addTuioListener(listener);
client.start();

Author:
Laurence Bender (based on TUIO Java backend 1.4 by Martin Kaltenbrunner)
Version:
1.0

 void addSceneBlob(SceneBlob sblb)
          This callback method is invoked by the SceneTuioClient when an existing SceneBlob is added to the session.

          This callback method is invoked by the SceneTuioClient when a new SceneTuioBlob is added to the session.

          This callback method is invoked by the SceneTuioClient when an existing SceneBlob is removed from the session.

Method Detail

addSceneTuioBlob

void addSceneTuioBlob(SceneTuioBlob tblb)
This callback method is invoked by the SceneTuioClient when a new SceneTuioBlob is added to the session.

Parameters:
tblb - the SceneTuioBlob reference associated to the addSceneTuioBlob event

updateSceneTuioBlob

void updateSceneTuioBlob(SceneTuioBlob tblb)
This callback method is invoked by the SceneTuioClient when an existing SceneTuioBlob is updated during the session.

Parameters:
tblb - the SceneTuioBlob reference associated to the updateSceneTuioBlob event

removeSceneTuioBlob

This callback method is invoked by the SceneTuioClient when an existing SceneTuioBlob is removed from the session.

Parameters:
tblb - the SceneTuioBlob reference associated to the removeSceneTuioBlob event

addSceneBlob

void addSceneBlob(SceneBlob sblb)
This callback method is invoked by the SceneTuioClient when an existing SceneBlob is added to the session.

Parameters:
sblb - the SceneBlob reference associated to the addSceneBlob event

updateSceneBlob

removeSceneBlob

void removeSceneBlob(SceneBlob sblb)
